description: This file is an HTML document for a web-based database viewer interface, including embedded CSS and JavaScript for rendering and interactions with a database browsing system.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets the view.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and renders data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for a data table given dataset.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Returns HTML for a table cell based on data type.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses content within a table cell.
